greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients in expansion of Dirichlet series Product_p (1-(Kronecker(m,p)+1)*p^(-s) + Kronecker(m,p)*p^(-2s))^(-1) for m = -19.
comment: Half of the number of integer solutions to x^2 + x*y + 5*y^2 = n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) is multiplicative with a(19^e) = 1, a(p^e) = (1 + (-1)^e) / 2 if Kronecker(-19, p) = -1, a(p^e) = e + 1 if Kronecker(-19, p) = 1.
G.f.: Sum_{k>0} Kronecker(-19, k) * x^k / (1 - x^k).
mathematica: a[n_] := If[n < 0, 0, DivisorSum[n, KroneckerSymbol[-19, #] &]]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 100}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 17 2018 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
